statements: SELECT * FROM athlete_progress_reports ORDER BY athlete_id DESC, progress_report_date ASC;
SELECT athlete_id, progress_description FROM athlete_progress_reports WHERE athlete_id = 3;
SELECT athlete_id, progress_report_date FROM athlete_progress_reports WHERE progress_report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM athlete_progress_reports;
SELECT DISTINCT athlete_id FROM athlete_progress_reports ORDER BY athlete_id;
SELECT athlete_id, progress_report_date, progress_description FROM athlete_progress_reports;
SELECT progress_report_date, progress_description, athlete_id FROM athlete_progress_reports ORDER BY athlete_id DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, progress_description FROM athlete_progress_reports WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM athlete_progress_reports ORDER BY progress_report_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, progress_report_date FROM athlete_progress_reports WHERE progress_report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM athletes
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_sport FROM athletes
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_sport FROM athletes WHERE athlete_sport='Swimming'
SELECT * FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT report_type, report_content FROM reports WHERE athlete_id=100
SELECT * FROM athletes WHERE athlete_sport = 'Basketball';
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_sport FROM athletes WHERE athlete_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT athlete_sport FROM athletes ORDER BY athlete_sport DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, COUNT(*) AS athlete_count FROM athletes GROUP BY athlete_name HAVING athlete_count > 1;
SELECT athlete_name, report_date FROM athletes JOIN reports ON athletes.athlete_id = reports.athlete_id ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM AthleteProgress;
SELECT athlete_id, progress_measure, date FROM AthleteProgress ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, MAX(progress_measure) AS max_progress FROM AthleteProgress GROUP BY athlete_id;
SELECT athlete_id, COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM AthleteProgress GROUP BY athlete_id;
SELECT athlete_id, AVG(progress_measure) AS avg_progress FROM AthleteProgress GROUP BY athlete_id;
SELECT athlete_id, date, progress_measure FROM AthleteProgress WHERE progress_measure > 0.5 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT athlete_id, date, performance_metric FROM PerformanceTrends WHERE date = '2022-09-15'
SELECT athlete_id, date, attendance_status FROM Attendance ORDER BY athlete_id, date DESC
SELECT athlete_id, AVG(progress_measure) AS average_progress FROM AthleteProgress GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING average_progress > 0.3 ORDER BY average_progress DESC
SELECT athlete_id, COUNT(*) AS attendance_count FROM Attendance GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING attendance_count >= 3 ORDER BY attendance_count DESC
SELECT athlete_name, sport FROM athletes WHERE age > 25;
SELECT athlete_name, date_of_birth FROM athletes WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT athlete_name, sport, age FROM athletes WHERE sport = 'Swimming';
SELECT * FROM performance WHERE performance_rating > 8.5;
SELECT athlete_name, trend_name, trend_value FROM athletes JOIN trends ON athletes.athlete_id = trends.athlete_id;
SELECT * FROM athletes WHERE age > 25;
SELECT athlete_name, sport FROM athletes WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY athlete_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance WHERE performance_rating >= 8.0 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, sport, age FROM athletes WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'F' ORDER BY athlete_name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, performance_rating FROM athletes JOIN performance ON athletes.athlete_id = performance.athlete_id WHERE performance_rating < 5.0;
SELECT * FROM Athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_team, athlete_age FROM Athletes ORDER BY athlete_age DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_age FROM Athletes WHERE athlete_team = 'Team A';
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_team FROM Athletes WHERE athlete_age > 25 ORDER BY athlete_name ASC;
SELECT athlete_name, attendance_date, attendance_status FROM Athletes JOIN Attendance ON Athletes.athlete_id = Attendance.athlete_id;
SELECT * FROM Athletes WHERE athlete_age > 25 ORDER BY athlete_name DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_team FROM Athletes WHERE athlete_team IS NOT NULL ORDER BY athlete_name;
SELECT performance_date, performance_metric, performance_value FROM Performance WHERE performance_value > 9 ORDER BY performance_date ASC;
SELECT report_date, report_type, report_content FROM Reports WHERE report_type = 'Injury' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT trend_description FROM Trends WHERE trend_type = 'Performance Trend' ORDER BY trend_date;
